title: Cloud Solutions Consultant
description:
CloudVibe Technologies Seeks Cloud Solutions Consultant (Full-Time)

CloudVibe Technologies, a Sydney-based tech consultancy, drives cloud transformation for clients in finance, healthcare, and retail. We’re looking for an experienced Cloud Solutions Consultant to lead our cloud initiatives.

About the Role
As an Executive, you’ll design and oversee cloud architectures that empower client success, guiding teams and stakeholders through complex transformations.

Your Duties

  • Architect cloud solutions on AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
    - Lead cloud migrations from planning to execution.
    - Ensure security and compliance in cloud deployments.
    - Collaborate with client IT teams for integration.
    - Mentor junior architects.
    - Develop cloud strategy roadmaps.
    - Optimize cloud performance and costs.
    - Stay informed about cloud innovations.
    - Present solutions to executives.
    - Manage project budgets.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 6–8 years of experience in cloud architecture, proficient in AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. Strong leadership and strategic planning skills are essential, along with cloud security knowledge. Excellent stakeholder communication is required. A Bachelor’s degree in computer science, IT, or a related field is necessary.

Why CloudVibe?
We’re innovators pushing technology forward. Our hybrid work model balances flexibility and collaboration. We offer certifications, conferences, and premium tools to support your growth. You’ll tackle high-impact projects in a creative environment.

Benefits
Health and dental insurance
Superannuation contributions
25 days of annual leave
Certification budget
Access to cloud platforms
Team retreats

Apply Today
Lead cloud transformation with CloudVibe Technologies. Submit your application now!

#CloudVibeCareers #CloudSolutions #HiringNow
